ValidationRule.description: If the Animal Status is in any variation of Stray Hold or ID Trace then a Date Due Out is required for all records where Is_New__c is set true
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( CONTAINS(TEXT(animalos__Status__c), "Stray Hold"), CONTAINS(TEXT(animalos__Status__c), "ID Trace") ), ISBLANK(aos_Date_Due_Out__c), aos_Is_New__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Animal Status is in Stray Hold ~ Or ID Trace then please add a Date Due Out.
